reference.shortdesc: Source information identifies a resource from which the present topic is derived, either completely or in part.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The source element contains a description of the resource. Alternatively, the href or keyref attributes can be used to reference a description of the resource.
This element is equivalent to the Source element in Dublin Core.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: It is implementation-dependent what it means when the element has both content and an attribute-based reference to another resource.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , (with a narrowed definition for href, given below), and keyref.

dlentry.dd: Provides a reference to a resource from which the present resource is derived. See for detailed information on supported values and processing implications.
